title: Brand-New Boutique Tasmania Stay with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description: Worlds away from the bustling city but with easy access to Hobart, Iron Creek Bay offers a unique opportunity to reconnect with nature amid the stunning Tasmania countryside. Just a 30-minute drive from the capital, this soothing retreat offers a seamless combination of countryside charm and contemporary luxury. Wander the serene farmland alongside animals that roam the orchard and vineyard, and keep an eye out for Woody Island's white-bellied sea eagles in the sky or brown tree frogs in the lily pond. When hunger strikes, savour seasonal dishes featuring local produce at Restaurant Orani Bar and Grill, coffee and sweet treats at the Iron Creek Bay Cafe or devour succulent fruits from the orchards such as cherries, apricots, apples and grapes.

title: Boutique Tasmania Farm Stay with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credits
description:
Made for those looking to get away from the bustling city while still having Hobart within reach, Iron Creek Bay offers a unique opportunity to reconnect with nature amid the stunning Tasmania countryside. Just a 30-minute drive from Hobart, this soothing retreat offers a seamless combination of countryside charm and contemporary luxury. Wander the serene farmland alongside animals that roam the orchard and vineyard - including geese, turkeys, ducks, chickens, sheep and alpacas - and be sure to keep an eye out for Woody Island's white-bellied sea eagles in the sky or brown tree frogs in the lily pond.

When hunger strikes, savour seasonal dishes featuring local produce at Restaurant Orani Bar and Grill, a coffee or sweet treat at the Iron Creek Bay Cafe or devour succulent fruits from the orchards such as cherries, apricots, apples and grapes. As the sun sets, retire to a calming room or pavilion boasting a cypress wood interior and sweeping views.

When hunger strikes, savour seasonal dishes featuring local produce at Orani, or devour succulent fruits from the orchards such as cherries, apricots, apples and grapes. As the sun sets, retire to a calming room or pavilion boasting a cypress wood interior and sweeping views.

description:
Made for those looking to get away from the bustling city while still having Hobart within reach, Iron Creek Bay offers a unique opportunity to reconnect with nature amid the stunning Tasmania countryside. Just a 30-minute drive from Hobart, this soothing retreat offers a seamless combination of countryside charm and contemporary luxury. Wander the serene farmland alongside animals that roam the orchard and vineyard - including geese, turkeys, ducks, chickens, sheep and alpacas - and be sure to keep an eye out for Woody Island's white-bellied sea eagles in the sky or brown tree frogs in the lily pond.

When hunger strikes, savour seasonal dishes featuring local produce at Restaurant Orani Bar and Grill, a coffee or sweet treat at the Iron Creek Bay Cafe with views towards the sea and Mt.
